purpose: The email announces a postdoctoral position available in programming languages, specifically focusing on fixed-point-oriented programming. The sender, an assistant professor at NUS, encourages recipients to share the opportunity with interested candidates. The position involves developing programs based on inference rules that simplify complex algorithms in various domains. Interested applicants are invited to email the sender to schedule a Zoom interview, as the hiring process is set to begin immediately. The position offers a competitive salary and funding for 2 to 3 years, contingent upon satisfactory progress. Additional details about the project and the sender's research are provided, along with links to further information.
